prompts: Create a jellyfish-like Pokemon that glows in the dark and has flowing tentacles.
Imagine a water-type Pokemon with a soft pink color and elegant features.
Design a cute ghost-type Pokemon that resembles a floating jellyfish with a friendly expression.
Show me a Pokemon that combines elements of the sea with a whimsical, ethereal design.
Generate a Pokemon that has delicate, translucent appendages and a serene personality.
Make a Pokemon that looks like a gentle spirit from the ocean depths, with pastel colors.
Give me a design for a Pokemon that has a calming presence and fluid movements.
